response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase the product for $9,500. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the exclusivity of the offer. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us, providing you with access to something truly special while allowing me to maximize the value of my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
